attributes.additional_details: save our soilders is about to bring our soilders home from iraq and afghanistan.Every day our soilders are dying in iraq and afghanistan. There bodies come back to briatin in coffins, they should not come back in coffins. Mums, dads,wife's, husbands, kids they let there husband or wifes to go to irag or afghanistan and they hope and pray that there wife or husband wil come back alive. Most of our soilders are young men. they should not die young just because america can not stick up for them selfs. now its time to get out soilders home! Dont let another young person die!
